content: sock monkey cabin blanket by jennifer davidson materials bernat super value 197 grams/426 yards colour a winter white 4 balls colour b redwood heather 1 ball colour c true grey 2 balls size 9 0 mm us 13 circular knitting needle 40 instructions blanket is worked with 2 strands of yarn throughout border with 2 strands of colour a cast on 130 stitches work in 2 x 2 ribbing for 10 row switch to colour b and continue in 2 x 2 ribbing for 7 row switch back to colour a and continue in ribbing for 15 row main section with one strand of colour a and one of colour c work in 2 x 2 ribbing for 150 row or until desired length border follow instructions as for above border but make sure to reverse the stripes width to ensure they match cast off in rib weave in ends
